name: AnylineTireTreadSdk
summary: Mobile Metrology SDK for Measuring Tire Wear
description: The Anyline Tire Tread SDK uses metrology to help you accurately measure the tread wear on tires. The SDK is highly customizable, allowing you to set green, yellow and red stop light rules according to your countries laws. This will help your technicians to eliminate any guesswork and service more vehicles. No advanced computer vision knowledge needed.
